group_1.narration: We couldn't figure out a good time to all go@together, so I just came here on my own...
The shrine itself has a mystical,@strange aura to it...
Maybe that's why miracles happen here.
Well, we came all this way...@Might as well pay it a proper visit!

group_1.textCenter: Whoa, it's huuuge!@What a big shrine...
Okay, I have to pay my respects.@[chara:200101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json]Offering... I need something to offer up...
I don't have any 5 yen coins!@Hmm, ah...
Then I guess I'll use a 10 yen coin!@[chara:200101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Maybe it'll double my prayer power.

group_1.narration: I wish that everyone can live a happy life...
That no one will ever encounter a Witch, @or come to any harm...
And if they do stumble upon a Witch,@I wish for the power to protect them...

group_1.textCenter: All right, time to head home!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's just a passing shower.
(I only just got done praying at the shrine,@and my luck has already taken a bad turn...)
Aww... I'm soaked now.@What a pain!
Oh, hello!

group_1.textRight: You can...@Use this handkerchief, if you like...

group_1.textLeft: Th...[chara:200101:motion_201]thank you!
I was just wondering what to do since @I got so drenched.

group_1.textRight: The bus just left a minute ago...
The next one won't be here@for another 30 minutes or so...
So you better hurry and dry yourself@off or you're going to catch a cold.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Thanks so much for the handkerchief.@It's just what I needed!
...Oh my gosh!
Oh, um, I just...[chara:200101:cheek_1]sorry!
It's just...The book you're holding...@It's "The Lucky Cat Waltz" isn't it?
I really love that book, so I got excited...

group_1.textRight: Wha! I really...love it, too!@[chara:301101:cheek_1]It's my absolute favorite book!

group_1.textLeft: Right?@It's so good!
The main character, the cat, is sooo cute!

group_1.textRight: Finding someone else who knows this book...
Where the cat from the title is @dashing through the night sky...

group_1.textLeft: I love that part[chara:200101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] so much too!@[chara:200101:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.15][chara:200101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:200101:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
...I'm Madoka, Madoka Kaname. @It's so nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: ...Kako Natsume.@It's great to meet you, too.

group_1.textLeft: Seeing how we have to wait anyway, [chara:200101:motion_100]do@you want to chat about the book for a bit?
I've always wanted to know what other @people think about it!

group_1.narration: And so I had a great@time chatting with Kako@about our favorite book.
The bus arrived in what felt @like an instant, and once we@got on we talked even more.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*@It's been so fun chatting with you!
Well, I'll see you around! Bye!

group_1.narration: With that, Kako and I parted ways.
I wouldn't learn that she was a@Magical Girl until our next meeting...
